program.name: gc
program.configure:
case "${SB_SYSTYPE}" in *-aix*) CC=xlc CFLAGS="-O2 -qro -qroconst -qmaxmem=-1 -qarch=ppc" CPPFLAGS="-DAO_USE_PTHREAD_DEFS" LDFLAGS="-Wl,-brtl" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-blibpath:"
ARGS="--enable-threads=posix" ;; ia64*-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" LDFLAGS="-Wl,+nodefaultrpath" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+b," ;; *-hpux11.00) CC="cc -Ae" CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +ESlit +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CPPFLAGS="-DNO_GETCONTEXT" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
ARGS="--enable-threads=posix" ;; *-hpux11.11) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Ofltacc +Olit=all +DAportable \ +Oentrysched +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b,"
ARGS="--enable-threads=posix" ;; *-hpux*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-z +O2 +Onofltacc +Olit=all +Oentrysched \ +Odataprefetch +Onolimit" CPPFLAGS="-DAO_USE_PTHREAD_DEFS" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,+s,+b," ;; *-irix*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-Wl,-woff,84 -Wl,-woff,85 -woff 1009,1429 \ -use_readonly_const -G0 -rdata_shared -DEBUG:optimize_space=ON \ -O2 -OPT:Olimit=0" CPPFLAGS="-DAO_USE_PTHREAD_DEFS" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linuxe3) CFLAGS="-O2 -mcpu=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; i?86*-linux*|i?86-suse-linux*) CFLAGS="-O2 -mtune=pentiumpro -march=pentiumpro" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-linux*) CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath," ;; *-osf*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-O2 -arch ev5 -msym -readonly_strings" CPPFLAGS="-DAO_USE_PTHREAD_DEFS" CC_LD_RT="-Wl,-rpath,"
ARGS="--enable-threads=posix" ;; i?86*-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=pentium4" CPPFLAGS="-DAO_USE_PTHREAD_DEFS" CC_LD_RT="-R"
ARGS="--enable-threads=posix" ;; *-solaris2.8) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -xarch=v8plusa" CC_LD_RT="-R" ;; *-solaris*) CC=cc CFLAGS="-mr -Qn -xstrconst -xO2 -xtarget=ultra2 \ -m32 -xarch=sparcvis" CC_LD_RT="-R"
ARGS="--enable-threads=posix" ;; esac
${SHELL} ./configure CC="${CC:-gcc}" CFLAGS="${CFLAGS:--O2}" \ CPPFLAGS="${CPPFLAGS+${CPPFLAGS}}" \ LDFLAGS="${LDFLAGS+${LDFLAGS}}" --datadir=${_datadir} \ --datarootdir=${_datadir} \ --disable-dependency-tracking \ ${ARGS+${ARGS}} \ --libdir=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX_LIB} \ --prefix=${SB_INSTALL_PREFIX}
gmake configure
${SB_PATH_SED} -i -e "\ s!-L\(\${libdir}\)!-L\1 ${CC_LD_RT}\1!;" bdw-gc.pc
